main module¶

main.py

Entry point for the car rental system application. Defines the PhilipRentACarApp singleton class and launches the main user interface menu. Implements the Singleton pattern to ensure only one app instance exists. Implements a lock file to prevent multiple simultaneous runs of the application.

class main.PhilipRentACarApp¶

Bases: object

Main application class for the Philip Rent A Car system. Handles database initialization and launches the main user interface menu.

run()¶

Starts the main user interface menu for the car rental system. This is the main entry point for user interaction.

Philip Rent-A-Car
